data.comment: The match has started, with Mouscron kicking-off.
Alessandro Ciranni (Mouscron) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 30, Kamal Sowah (Oud-Heverlee) gets a yellow card.
Saad Agouzoul (Mouscron) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Mouscron's Imad Faraj has been booked in Mouscron.
In the minute 42, Goal! Oud-Heverlee have got their heads in front thanks to a Thibault Vlietinck strike.
The home team replace Marko Bakic with Deni Hocko.
The first half has been concluded at Stade Le Canonnier.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway. Oud-Heverlee with the kick-off.
Oud-Heverlee have been given a penalty...
At Stade Le Canonnier, Herve Koffi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 55, David Hubert nets and Oud-Heverlee extend their lead to 0-2. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Jorge Simao is making the team's second substitution at Stade Le Canonnier with Serge Tabekou replacing Dimitri Mohamed.
Fabrice Olinga for Mouscron has been booked by Erik Lambrechts and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 70, Mouscron make their third substitution with Beni Badibanga replacing Fabrice Olinga.
Nuno Da Costa puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 1-2.
Daan Vekemans (Oud-Heverlee) has received a yellow card from Erik Lambrechts.
In the minute 77, Nuno Da Costa gets an equalizer for Mouscron. The score is now 2-2.
Olivier Myny is replacing Thibault Vlietinck for Oud-Heverlee at Stade Le Canonnier.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Josh Eppiah is on a sub for Moussa Al-Taamari for Oud-Heverlee.
Serge Tabekou for Mouscron has been booked by Erik Lambrechts and receives a first yellow card.
